name: codingmatters/zf-skeleton-app
description: Initial Zend Framework skeleton application structure

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-cache
zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to install caching support?

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-db
zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to install database support (installs zend-db)?

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-form
zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to install forms support?

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-json
zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to install JSON de/serialization support?

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-log
zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to install logging support?

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-mvc-console
zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to install MVC-based console support? (We recommend migrating to zf-console, symfony/console, or Aura.CLI)

zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to install the official MVC plugins, including PRG support, identity, and flash messages?

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-psr7bridge
zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to use the PSR-7 middleware dispatcher?

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-session
zend-skeleton-installer.prompt: Would you like to install sessions support?

zend-skeleton-installer.name: zendframework/zend-servicemanager-di
